title: UCI Already Enforcing its New Brake Lever Rules at Santos Tour Down Under
content:
Commissaires tested all the bikes ahead of the first stage of the women's race, and two bikes were found non-compliant. More tests are slated during the men's WorldTour opener.

Read the full article at UCI Already Enforcing its New Brake Lever Rules at Santos Tour Down Under on Velo.
author: ahood
